page.title: 16Community Life
page.content: We are going to write about Bricket Wood as that is where we live. There is a very strong sense of community in Bricket Wood, the idea of belonging to the village is felt by many people, so that it is more than just a place to live.There are many organisations which will help you when times are difficult. The Bricket Wood Ratepayer's Association makes sure that the local Councils do their job properly and keeps a watchful eye on building of roads and houses.It tries to find out the concerns of everyone in the community and puts them forward to the councils.
